description.value:
As your ferocity grows, you gain benefits as noted on the Vuken Growing Ferocity table. Benefits are cumulative except where an improved benefit replaces a lesser benefit.

Ferocity

Benefit

2

Whenever you use the Knockback maneuver, you can target one additional creature.

4

The first time on a turn that you push a creature or knock a creature prone, you [[/surge 1]].

6

You gain an edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.

8 (4th level)

The first time on a turn that you push a creature or knock a creature prone, you [[/surge 2]].

10 (7th level)

You have a double edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.

12 (10th level)

Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain [[/heal 10 temp]]. Additionally, whenever you make a power roll that imposes forced movement on a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.
